original_text: And the Lord will strike Egypt, striking and healing, and they will return to the Lord, and he will listen to their pleas for mercy and heal them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 애굽을 치실지라도 치시고는 고치실 것이므로 그들이 여호와께로 돌아올 것이라 여호와께서 그들의 간구함을 들으시고 그들을 고쳐 주시리라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord will strike Egypt
and they will return to the Lord
and he will listen to their pleas for mercy
